title: "I'd run in there even if I didn't have a weapon": Trump on Florida shooting
text:
"I'd run in there even if I didn't have a weapon": Trump on Florida shooting 12:08am IST - 00:45 
President Trump tells a group of governors that he would have run into the Florida high school during the massacre ''even if I didn't have a weapon.''   
President Trump tells a group of governors that he would have run into the Florida high school during the massacre "even if I didn't have a weapon."  //reut.rs/2EVxcGt
